definitions.definition: Slave ; one under the control of another.
examples: My father was always a thrall to alcohol.

definitions.definition: The state of being under the control of another person.
examples: Today's kids are in thrall to the factitious excitements of streamers' entertainment.

definitions.definition: A shelf ; a stand for barrels , etc.

main_definition: ( literary or puristic , otherwise archaic ) Slave ; one under the control of another.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The state of being under the control of another person.
A shelf ; a stand for barrels , etc.
